name: STUMP
description:
The Brave Stump sets out to chase lumberjacks through which he is no longer a beautiful tree. Guide Stump through five lands, collect lost leaves and help him regain his former shape.

The second game mode allows you to breed wonderful trees, starting with seeds and pots with soil.

How to play:

- Collect all gold leaves to complete the board

- Collect all green leaves to get the whistle

- Collect all gold and green leaves to activate the golden owl mode

- Replace gained shields and whistles for reinforcements, additional boards, skins and other items

- Beat records in the endless modes of the golden owl

Reinforcements:

Tik Tak - stop the time and make additional traffic

Vacuum - download leaves from a larger area

Rewind - undo the unsuccessful move

Longer - make a longer move

Key features:

- 142 levels

- 21 stump skins

- 21 tire skins

- The endless mode of the golden owl

- 13 puzzles to solve

- 14 species of trees to grow

- 14 types of pots
